resources.string: Not a Member yet? Sign Up here.

What is Cybit? Cybit is a cybersecurity awareness application which helps the user to keep a track of its computer in a funny but attentive way.It connects with you PC or laptop and helps you get the security status of your laptop via a character on your mobile application. The health of your character will define the status of your computer. Itâ€™s a pretty handy application which can be used on the go as well. To educate the user on the security issues there are different types of quizzes which can be played after creating your own account.
Cybit Team We are team of 7 students from EPITA college in Paris working together to make the world aware about cybersecurity. Rohit Chauhan Mourad Melki Alain Khoury Jad Karaki Sadek Seridj Ibrahima Toure Eymerick Laloupo
Application Map Login Page: Helps you create account and login Home Page: Shows the Tamagotchi health and character based on the computer health. Profile Page: Helps you update your profile and password Quiz Game: Helps you to upgrade your cybersecurity knowledge by indulging you in a quiz game. My Computers: Displays the number of devices you have and which one are you connected to. News: Displays all the links and channels which you can subscribe based on your taste.
Version 1.0
